thread.title: Arsenal: Ian Wright had a breakdown on Twitter as Gunners collapsed vs Bayern Munich | Metro News
thread.title_full: Arsenal: Ian Wright had a breakdown on Twitter as Gunners collapsed vs Bayern Munich | Metro News

author: Sean Kearns For Metro.Co.Uk
title: Arsenal: Ian Wright had a breakdown on Twitter as Gunners collapsed vs Bayern Munich | Metro News
text:
Sean Kearns for Metro.co.uk Wednesday 15 Feb 2017 9:41 pm Ian Wright labelled Arsenal a ‘f g shambles’ (Picture: Getty) 
Arsenal legend Ian Wright couldn’t bare watching his old side collapse against Bayern Munich and turned off the TV as the Germans went 4-1 up. 
Arsene Wenger’s side were level at the break after Alexis Sanchez’s equaliser ruled out Arjen Robben’s opening goal. 
However, the Gunners were 4-1 down on aggregate just 20 minutes into the second half after Thiago Alcantara’s brace and Robert Lewandowski’s header. 
It was all too much for Wright, who spelled out his frustration to his 1.2m followers in a series of foul-mouthed tweets…. Oh for ****sake 😡😡😡 
— Ian Wright (@IanWright0) February 15, 2017 We are a g shambles 😫 
— Ian Wright (@IanWright0) February 15, 2017 At least let it go to the g home leg 🙏🙏🙏 
— Ian Wright (@IanWright0) February 15, 2017 **** it !!! Not watching anymore. 😡 
— Ian Wright (@IanWright0) February 15, 2017 More
